instruction: Generate a story of 3 to 5 sentences that uses a metaphor to describe the relationship between two people
output: Two people stood before each other, like two trees on either side of a river, their trunks separate but the roots bound together inextricably. Their branches stretched out many times, intertwining in an intricate pattern for all to see. Every gesture seemed to be filled with both a depth of understanding and a grasp of the unknown. They were a part of each other, connected by a bond that transcended all language.
